00024 /*! \file CELFileComparer.h This file contains a class to compare a GCOS CEL file and Calvin format CEL. */
00025 
00026 #include "calvin_files/fusion/src/FusionCELData.h"
00027 //
00028 #include "file/CELFileData.h"
00029 //
00030 #include <cstring>
00031 #include <fstream>
00032 #include <list>
00033 #include <string>
00034 //
00035 
00036 using namespace std;
00037 
00038 namespace affymetrix_comparers
00039 {
00040 
00041 /*! This class will convert a CEL file from GCOS to Calvin format. */
00042 class CELFileComparer
00043 {
00044 public:
00045         /*! Error codes for the conversion process. */
00046         typedef enum _CompareErrorCodes
00047         {
00048                 NoError,                                /*! No error. */
00049                 CalvinFileAsInputError, /*! The input file is a Calvin CEL file. */
00050                 UnableToOpenCelFile,    /*! Unable to open the input CEL file. */
00051                 UnableToWriteTheFile,   /*! Unable to write the output file. */
00052                 ComparisonFailed                /*! Comparison between Calvin and GCOS Cel files failed. */
00053         } CompareErrorCodes;
00054 
00055         /*! Constructor */
00056         CELFileComparer();
00057         CELFileComparer(bool newWriteDetailedDiffFile, float newTolerance, bool newIgnoreMask, bool newCelSummary, bool newIgnoreHeaders);
00058 
00059         /*! Destructor */
00060         ~CELFileComparer();
00061 
00062         /*! Sets the name of the GCOS CEL file.
00063          * @param name The full path name of the CEL file.
00064          */
00065         void SetFileNameGCOS(const char *name) { fileNameGCOS = name; }
00066 
00067         /*! Sets the name of the Calvin CEL file.
00068          * @param name The full path name of the CEL file.
00069          */
00070         void SetFileNameCalvin(const char *name) { fileNameCalvin = name; }
00071 
00072         /*! Gets the name of the GCOS CEL file.
00073          * @return The full path name of the CEL file.
00074          */
00075         std::string GetFileNameGCOS() const { return fileNameGCOS; }
00076 
00077         /*! Gets the name of the GCOS CEL file.
00078          * @return The full path name of the CEL file.
00079          */
00080         std::string GetFileNameCalvin() const { return fileNameCalvin; }
00081 
00082         /*! Gets the error code for the conversion process.
00083          * @return The error code associated with the last failure.
00084          */
00085         CompareErrorCodes GetErrorCode() const { return errorCode; }
00086 
00087         /*! Convert the file to the Calvin format.
00088          * @return True if successful.
00089          */
00090         bool CompareFiles();
00091 
00092         /*! Get the output file name.
00093          * @return The output file name.
00094          */
00095         std::string GetOutputFileName() const { return outputFile; }
00096 
00097 private:
00098         /*! The GCOS CEL file object. */
00099         affxcel::CCELFileData gcos;
00100 
00101         /*! The Calvin CEL file object. */
00102         affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData fusion;
00103 
00104         ofstream streamCompare;
00105 
00106         /*! The GCOS CEL file name. */
00107         std::string fileNameGCOS;
00108 
00109         /*! The Calvin CEL file name. */
00110         std::string fileNameCalvin;
00111 
00112         /*! The name of the output CEL file. */
00113         std::string outputFile;
00114 
00115         /*! The error code. */
00116         CompareErrorCodes errorCode;
00117         
00118         /*! Reads the CEL file into a data object.
00119          * @return True if successful.
00120          */
00121         bool ReadGCOSFile();
00122 
00123         /*! Reads the CEL file into a data object.
00124          * @return True if successful.
00125          */
00126         bool ReadCalvinFile();
00127 
00128         /*! Closes the files. */
00129         void CloseFile();
00130 
00131         /*! Creates a Calvin file with the expression probe sets results.
00132          * @return True if successful.
00133          */
00134         bool Compare();
00135 
00136         /*! Helper function.  Trim excess spaces from the end of a string.      */
00137         void trim(std::string& str);
00138 
00139         /*! Helper function.  Compare floating point values.    */
00140         bool CompareFloats(float, float);
00141 
00142         /*! Detailed Diff file flag                                             */
00143         bool detailedDiffFile;
00144 
00145         /*! Ignore Mask flag                                    */
00146         bool ignoreMask;
00147 
00148         /*! celSummary flag                                             */
00149         bool celSummary;
00150 
00151         /*! Float comparison tolerance                                  */
00152         float float_tolerance;
00153 
00154         /*! Ignore Headers flag                                 */
00155         bool ignoreHeaders;
00156 };

00158 }
